text: Hagi antahiho, havi anumzantamima troma nehia vahe'ene azama hu'za ana anumzama tro'ma nehaza vahe'mo'zanena zamagazegu hugahaze. Na'ankure ana havi anumzamofo ame'ma'a vahe'mo'za zamazanteti tro hu'naze. E'ina hu'negu zamatrenke'za eme eri atru hute'za amare eho. Tamagerfa hu'na nagra zamazeri koro hanuge'za, zamagazegu hugahaze.
